trends: There have been 4 other sightings in San Marcos
There were no other sightings in San Marcos on or around June 21st 1991
divs: Sighting DetailsWAS NIGHTFALL-WIFE AND I WERE VISITING OUR DAUGHTER AND GRANDSON IN SAN MARCOSTEXAS-ON EARLE STREET--I SAID TO MY GRANDSON -LETS GO OUT SIDE I WISH TOSMOKE-WHEN WE GOT OUT SIDE I INSTANTLY SAW SEVERAL UFOS (7 TO 10) FLYING VERYHIGH SORT OF PLAYING AROUND-THEN CAME THE TRIANGLE SHAPED ONE SO LOW IT ACTUALLYBLOCKED OUT THE STARS FOR SOME SECONDS-BEAUTIFUL LIGHTS AND ABSOLUTLY NONOISEVERY SCARRY-I CALLED FOR MY WISE AND DAUGHTER--THEY LAUGHED AND WOULD NOTCOMEOUT-I CALLED THE OTHER FAMILY IN THE DUPLEX-THEY CAME OUT-2 ADULTS AND 2SMALL CHILDREN-IT WAS BREATHTAKING-THANK YOU --RFM--
